item.title: EP 818 - Can A Ghost Turn You Into A Murderer?
item.itunes:title: Can A Ghost Turn You Into A Murderer?
item.description:
Today we learn sometimes you shouldn’t take the law into your own hands, fight each other to see who has to get kidnapped by a Shadowman, and then we meet a bull that may inspire us to become murderers!
